entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
